Articles.Content:
hi everyone,

Recently I noticed there was a green cross displayed in my map view wich points a couple km west of KSC

I have struggled to find where it was from as I have not a damned idea. I tried to deactivate some of my mods without any kind of results.

here is a pic :

any idea where it comes from and how to remove it?

thanks in advance guys

Edited October 15, 2015 by psychopoak
It's from one of your mods. It looks like a MechJeb marker but I've only seen red and blue markers, I dont know what green is.
I think that is MechJeb's auto-KSC landing feature. Can you open Mechjeb and the landing autopilot to show settings?
ScanSat also has markers like that, but they only show up if you've placed them yourself. Since you don't know what the marker is, I'm guessing that this isn't the case here.

ScanSat also has markers like that, but they only show up if you've placed them yourself. Since you don't know what the marker is, I'm guessing that this isn't the case here.

actually you're right

your remark made me look back at ScanSat. after fidling a bit with mechjeb's landing guidance without a solution, I got back to scansat settings and found the culprit. I eventually disabled the option "use mechjeb targert system". once I popped the green light back on this option, the cross disappeared.

so thanks for the help guys
